title: Turkey Broth
summary: Turkey Broth might be just the side dish you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains approximately 9g of protein, 3g of fat, and a total of 202 calories. This caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal recipe serves 1 and costs $4.63 per serving. If you have water, carrots, chicken broth, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 4 hours. With a spoonacular score of 81%, this dish is super. Similar recipes are Homemade Turkey Broth, Crock Pot Turkey Broth, and Ramen with Smoked Turkey Broth.
